title: Slow-Cooker Barbecue Ribs
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Step 2: Season ribs with salt and black pepper; place in a shallow baking pan. Brown in the preheated oven for 15 minutes; flip. Brown 15 minutes more; drain fat. Transfer ribs to a slow cooker.
Step 3: Combine ketchup, chili sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, oregano, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, and black pepper in a medium bowl. Pour sauce over ribs; flip to coat.
Step 4: Cover slow cooker. Cook on Low until ribs are tender, 6 to 8 hours.
